meanings.definition: Of or relating to an epicycloid.
meanings.sent1: The epicycloidal shape of the gear allowed for smooth movement.
meanings.sent2: The toy had an interesting epicycloidal design.
meanings.sent3: The epicycloidal pattern on the wall looked like a fun maze.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved in an epicycloidal path, circling back to the same idea.
meanings.sent5: The artist used vibrant colors to highlight the epicycloidal curves in the painting.
